description: The trap tIPsecRUTnlFailToCreate is sent when creation of a
remote-user tunnel fails with reason indicated by
tIPsecNotifReason.

event.Summary: Remote-user tunnel creation failed due to $v7

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD TIMETRA-IPSEC-MIB::tIPsecRUTnlFailToCreate TIMETRA-SERV-MIB::svcId u 9999 TIMETRA-SAP-MIB::sapPortId u 9999 TIMETRA-SAP-MIB::sapEncapValue u 9999 TIMETRA-IPSEC-MIB::tIPsecNotifRUTnlInetAddrType i 0 TIMETRA-IPSEC-MIB::tIPsecNotifRUTnlInetAddress s EXAM TIMETRA-IPSEC-MIB::tIPsecNotifRUTnlPort i 9999 TIMETRA-IPSEC-MIB::tIPsecNotifReason s EXAMPLE

description: The value of the object svcId specifies the Service identifier. This
value should be unique within the service domain.
variables.name: TIMETRA-SERV-MIB::svcId

description: The ID of the access port where this SAP is defined.
variables.name: TIMETRA-SAP-MIB::sapPortId

description: The value of the label used to identify this SAP on the access port
specified by sapPortId.
variables.name: TIMETRA-SAP-MIB::sapEncapValue

description: The value of the object tIPsecNotifRUTnlInetAddrType indicates address
type of tIPsecNotifRUTnlInetAddress object.
variables.name: TIMETRA-IPSEC-MIB::tIPsecNotifRUTnlInetAddrType

description: This value of tIPsecNotifRUTnlInetAddress indicates the address of
of the SAP IPsec gateway to the tunnel.
variables.name: TIMETRA-IPSEC-MIB::tIPsecNotifRUTnlInetAddress

description: The value of tIPsecNotifRUTnlPort indicates the UDP port of the SAP
IPsec gateway to the tunnel.
variables.name: TIMETRA-IPSEC-MIB::tIPsecNotifRUTnlPort

description: The value of tIPsecNotifReason indicates the reason for the
IPsec notification.
variables.name: TIMETRA-IPSEC-MIB::tIPsecNotifReason

description: The trap tIPsecRUSAFailToAddRoute is sent when adding route to
tIPsecRUSARemAddr for the remote-user tunnel fails with reason
indicated by tIPsecNotifReason.

event.Summary: Adding route for remote-user tunnel failed due to $v4

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD TIMETRA-IPSEC-MIB::tIPsecRUSAFailToAddRoute TIMETRA-IPSEC-MIB::tIPsecRUSARemAddrType i 0 TIMETRA-IPSEC-MIB::tIPsecRUSARemAddr s EXAM TIMETRA-IPSEC-MIB::tIPsecRUSARemAPrefLen u 0 TIMETRA-IPSEC-MIB::tIPsecNotifReason s EXAMPLE

description: The value of tIPsecRUSARemAddrType indicates the address
type of address in tIPsecRUSARemAddr.
variables.name: TIMETRA-IPSEC-MIB::tIPsecRUSARemAddrType

description: The value of tIPsecRUSARemAddr indicates the ip address
on the tunnel side.
variables.name: TIMETRA-IPSEC-MIB::tIPsecRUSARemAddr

description: The value of tIPsecRUSARemAPrefLen indicates the
number of bits to match of the tIPsecRUSARemAddr.
variables.name: TIMETRA-IPSEC-MIB::tIPsecRUSARemAPrefLen

description: The value of tIPsecNotifReason indicates the reason for the
IPsec notification.
variables.name: TIMETRA-IPSEC-MIB::tIPsecNotifReason

description: The notification tIPsecBfdIntfSessStateChgd is generated when the
operational state of BFD session of the IPSec instance changes.

event.Summary: Operational state of BFD session on interface: $v5

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD TIMETRA-IPSEC-MIB::tIPsecBfdIntfSessStateChgd TIMETRA-IPSEC-MIB::tIPsecNotifBfdIntfSvcId u 9999 TIMETRA-IPSEC-MIB::tIPsecNotifBfdIntfIfName s EXAMPLE TIMETRA-IPSEC-MIB::tIPsecNotifBfdIntfDestIpType i 0 TIMETRA-IPSEC-MIB::tIPsecNotifBfdIntfDestIp s EXAM TIMETRA-IPSEC-MIB::tIPsecNotifBfdIntfSessState i 1

description: The value of tIPsecNotifBfdIntfSvcId specifies the service
ID of the interface running BFD in the notification.
variables.name: TIMETRA-IPSEC-MIB::tIPsecNotifBfdIntfSvcId

description: The value of tIPsecNotifBfdIntfIfName specifies the name of the
interface running BFD in the notification.
variables.name: TIMETRA-IPSEC-MIB::tIPsecNotifBfdIntfIfName

description: The value of tIPsecNotifBfdIntfDestIpType specifies the address type
of tIPsecNotifBfdIntfDestIp object.
variables.name: TIMETRA-IPSEC-MIB::tIPsecNotifBfdIntfDestIpType

description: The value of tIPsecNotifBfdIntfDestIp specifies the destination
IP address on the interface running BFD in the notification.
variables.name: TIMETRA-IPSEC-MIB::tIPsecNotifBfdIntfDestIp

description: The value of tIPsecNotifBfdIntfSessState indicates the operational
state of BFD session on the interface in the notification.
variables.name: TIMETRA-IPSEC-MIB::tIPsecNotifBfdIntfSessState
